global_flag1.description: Spawns the object if the global flag is enabled.

global_flag2.description: Spawns the object if this global flag and the first is enabled.

global_flag3.description: Spawns the object if all global flags are enabled.

DrawDistance.description: How close the object needs to be to the player before spawning.

ObjName.description: The internal name of the object.

Extra.name: A glowing cylinder used for the entrance of Kingdom Valley.
